1 /**
  2  * ensure private property/method stays private
  3  *
  4  * @namespace Strong typing for javascript
  5  */
  6 var PrivateForJS	= {};
  7 
  8 // include dependancies
  9 var Stacktrace		= Stacktrace	|| require('./stacktrace.js');
 10 var QGetterSetter	= QGetterSetter	|| require('./qgettersetter.js')
 11 
 12 
 13 // export the namespace in node.js - if running in node.js
 14 if( typeof(window) === 'undefined' )	module.exports	= PrivateForJS;
 15 
 16 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 17 //		Handle PrivateOKFn						//
 18 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 19 
 20 /**
 21  * determine which function is considered private for klass 
 22  * @param  {function} klass  the constructor of the class
 23  * @param  {object|function|function[]} [source] private functions - if Function, use it directly.
 24  *                           if Array.<function>, then each item is a private function
 25  *                           if object, then each of its property which is a function is private
 26  *                           if undefined, use klass.prototype which trigger the Object case
 27  */
 28 PrivateForJS.pushPrivateOkFn	= function(klass, source){
 29 	// if source isnt provided, use klass.prototype
 30 	if( source === undefined )	source	= klass.prototype;
 31 	// init ._privateOkFn if needed
 32 	klass._privateOkFn	= klass._privateOkFn	|| [];
 33 	// handle various case of source
 34 	if( typeof(source) === 'function' ){
 35 		klass._privateOkFn.push(source)
 36 	}else if( typeof(source) === 'object' ){
 37 		Object.keys(source).forEach(function(key){
 38 			var val	= source[key];
 39 			if( typeof(val) !== 'function' )	return;
 40 			klass._privateOkFn.push(val);			
 41 		});
 42 	}else if( source instanceof Array ){
 43 		source.forEach(function(fn){
 44 			console.assert( typeof(val) !== 'function' );
 45 			klass._privateOkFn.push(fn);			
 46 		});
 47 	}else	console.assert(false);
 48 }
 49 
 50 /**
 51  * return the functions allowed to access private values
 52  * @param  {Function} klass the class to query
 53  * @return {Array.<function>} return the function
 54  */
 55 PrivateForJS.getPrivateOkFn	= function(klass){
 56 	// init ._privateOkFn if needed
 57 	klass._privateOkFn	= klass._privateOkFn	|| [];
 58 	// return current ones
 59 	return klass._privateOkFn;
 60 }
 61 
 62 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 63 //		core								//
 64 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 65 
 66 /**
 67  * define a private property on a given instance of a object class
 68  * @param  {Function} klass	the class of the intenciated object
 69  * @param  {Object} baseObject	the object instance
 70  * @param  {String} property	the property name
 71  * @return {undefined}		nothing
 72  */
 73 PrivateForJS.privateProperty	= function(klass, baseObject, property){
 74 // @TODO should i put a setter too ?
 75 	QGetterSetter.defineGetter(baseObject, property, function aFunction(value, caller, property){
 76 		// generate privateOkFns if needed - functions which can access private properties
 77 		klass._privateOkFn	= klass._privateOkFn || PrivateForJS.pushPrivateOkFn(klass);
 78 		// if caller not privateOK, notify the caller
 79 		var privateOkFns= klass._privateOkFn;
 80 		if( privateOkFns.indexOf(caller) === -1 ){
 81 			// get stackFrame for the originId of the user
 82 			var stackFrame	= Stacktrace.parse()[2];
 83 			// log the event
 84 			console.assert(false, 'access to private property', "'"+property+"'", 'from', stackFrame.orginId());			
 85 		}
 86 		// actually return the value
 87 		return value;
 88 	});
 89 };
 90 
 91 /**
 92  * define a private function
 93  * @param  {Function} klass the class of the intenciated object
 94  * @param  {Function} fn    the function to overload
 95  * @return {Function}       the overloaded function
 96  */
 97 PrivateForJS.privateFunction	= function(klass, fn){
 98 	// MUST NOT use .bind(this) as it change the .caller value
 99 	var _this	= this;
100 	return function _checkPrivateFunction(){
101 		// get caller
102 		var caller	= _checkPrivateFunction.caller;
103 		// generate privateOkFns if needed - functions which can access private properties
104 		klass._privateOkFn	= klass._privateOkFn || PrivateForJS.pushPrivateOkFn(klass);
105 		// if caller not privateOK, notify the caller
106 		var privateOkFns= klass._privateOkFn;
107 		if( privateOkFns.indexOf(caller) === -1 ){
108 			// get stackFrame for the originId of the user
109 			var stackFrame	= Stacktrace.parse()[1];
110 			// log the event
111 			console.assert(false, 'access to private property', "'"+property+"'", 'from', stackFrame.orginId());			
112 		}
113 		// forward the call to the original function
114 		return fn.apply(_this, arguments);
115 	};
116 };
117 
118
